title: If you aren't playing meta, EVERYTHING is your fault....
body:
So basically no matter how well you play or how well you've done your job in your role, if you're not a meta pick a lost game is your fault no matter what.  Just had a game as Aatrox jungle and I got two kills bot lane as soon as I hit lvl 3 and then went back and got one for my ADC.  Meanwhile mid is losing 1v1 and top gets ganked cause he's literally at the enemy tower with no wards.

Bot then somehow goes like 2/12 together in under 10 mins without the enemy jungler having to do anything.....  I go top some more cause my top laner is crying non-stop for ganks... and mid keeps losing 1v1 then ganks ganked twice ina row and claims he's been ganked 8 times.

Guess what, we lost cause I played Aatrox, not cause bot got crushed even though I got them ahead, not cause my mid laner kept dying 1v1, and not cause our top laner is a blind bat.  Nope, I picked a non-meta champ so it's my fault.........

Lesson to learn form this?  Fuck crybabies, mute everyone, and do your best anyways, cause only playing the meta is boring as shit and I've climbed to plat a number of times without relying on it and I will again.  But you will ALWAYS be blamed for loses, it's unavoidable it seems, this community is just far too toxic.

replies.body: BAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA. That's all you hear in League of Legends. The sound of sheep kissing LCS ass. BAAAAAAAAAAAAA.

https://i.gyazo.com/36b5cc28d2d7f7c1810d549d855be493.jpg
my whole team inting and they want to report me and my support for playing adc darius
In selection jax started to say that my brain was the most destroyed brain ever, then he went 0/10 in laning phase
My vi continues to tell me that i'll make lose the game despite me being 4/0 in laning phase and making enemy ashe worthless

So i linked a video of adc darius i did at the end of the game, 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vpQFvr8vejc
and my jax told me that it only works in bronze despite me playing in diamond

league's community is just the one of the worst

or if you destroy and carry the enemy laner says, hm idk, morde, is op

"mordes so op"

*lists all of his downsides*

"yeah but he has a lot of damage" this was from a {{champion:92}}

Hue, as expected from Riven!
One of the lanes Mordekaiser just inherently dominates XD
First time MM replied to me, I feel blessed

You're a Mordekaiser player with the Pentakill icon.

No shit.

-- Gandalf

O WOW you won a cleave lane no wai....>>>???? You lost simply cause you didnt have a late game adc to destroy the enemy team. There is a you gotta have a adc and that not to just win the early game. FIN. RIP. You lose AGAIN.

yea i know dude

i know that with an adc i would have carried 0/10 jax +mid feeding+jungler feeding

rip me
what do you mean by lose again? because i'm counting my loses and i lost 4 times out of 15 or 20 times
Not even gonna speak English are you? Just a special type of mangled wording...

Just do what I do when I go off meta and my team gives me crap: tell them the pros are doing it. Tell them it's the next MF support or Ziggs bot carry. Since a lot of players are slaves to pro picks, that often shuts them up.

And the best part? You can lie. It's not like they're going to look it up right in the middle of a game and call you out. Hell, most of them won't look it up at all. Tell them that Darius bot dominated some tourney in Korea and now XYZ pro level streamer is winning with it. By the time they find out differently, you're long gone.

First thought: I love this idea.
Second thought: There really are some assholes who will afk for a minute to check way less important things. Or just to afk.

Hey, if they really wanted to AFK that badly, there was nothing you could have done anyway.

But at least you could play with them a bit:

"no no, I totally saw this in LCK"
"I didn't. Which game"
"are you on twitch, or youtube?"
"twitch"
"go to youtube"
"still can't see it"
"it wasn't an official game just look for the scrimmage games"
"where?"
"maybe <insert random Korean pro here> put the link in his twitter"
"still not seeing it"
"is he streaming right now?"
"Why?"
"Look up the vod"
"when"
"it's there just look a little bit"
"still can't find"
"okay, there's a link on reddit"

And then you report them because by now they've most likely been AFK for five minutes just surfing the internet for something that doesn't exist. It's like when you play with a dog, you pretend to throw the ball and they just take off to spend an embarrassing amount of time sniffing through the grass.
My dog is never fooled by that, and he's only 7 months old...
Not really... I know league community seems bad, but that's just because you've never played smite ranked.
i said one of the worst

Unfortunately the community is a biproduct of the moba genre as a whole. I've played every moba under the sun and even in games where individual skill means LESS THAN NOTHING (HotS), you'll still get wrecked on because of the way mobas are designed.

Even fucking Overwatch (a game with _no scoreboard_) has people pointing fingers by using the medal system. "Omg I'm all gold clearly SoMEONE is causing us to lose...hm...I bet it's YOU." As a side note: Overwatch and the hero shooter genre borrows a lot from the MOBA genre. While not as direct, these are still games where a bad player doesn't just hinder your team but empower the enemy team.

It's not even if you aren't playing the meta.  If you aren't playing the meta **the people in your game want**, then it's your fault.  

"Don't play Vi, Lee Sin is better."  The enemy team has a Yasuo top, Katarina Mid, and Ezreal ADC, unless you plan to pick Malzahar or Lissandra Mid and help me lock one of those people down and kill them, I'm picking Vi.  

"Someone swap with me, I don't like mage supports."  We have a Pantheon Top, Lee Sin Jungle, Zed Mid, and Caitlyn ADC.  I really don't care what you like or not cause I want to have some AP in this team comp.

"GG, jungler never ganks."  I'M A PRE-6 WARWICK/MALPHITE/SHYVANA/MASTER YI.  Do you want me to walk into lane and run menacingly at them which will accomplish nothing except waste time I could be using to get to 6?

"Enemy laner is 6/0, jungler come gank."  All that will accomplish is that this enemy laner will get a double kill.  Instead, how about I get this non-feeding lane some kills so hopefully they can carry you.

> "Don't play Vi, Lee Sin is better."

There are junglers better than Vi right now?
I dunno, Hecarim is up there. Same with Rengo.

Aatrox jg isn't even that far from meta.

Still, if you play something off-meta, your performance to the community doesn't matter unless you absolutely carry, so you need to brace yourself. Even if you do 'good', you may have tilted a random teammate through your 'troll' pick, and hence you are the reason they're being solo killed repeatedly. (I don't necessarily think this is legitimate, but people will place that sort of blame.)
I remember going 10/1 or something as Shaco jungle in season 5 and my team blamed me for or loss because I played a "troll jungler" lol

Well Shaco is a troll champion, but in the good sense, tilting the enemy to oblivion with boxes and mindgames.

Would be "punnier" if you were reported for playing Trundle btw.

This is so true lol

EDIT:  The random downvoting always seemed so weird to me lol

"DON'T PICK AATROX JUNGLE U IDIOT!"
"Fine"
"Alright, thanks." _Picks MF Support_
"What the actual fuck....."
Did you look at my match history?  Cause that's so close to what actually happened lol
This seems more like the "always blame the jungler"-bullshit than "off meta=bad"-bullshit :P

When the people bitching at me are specifically bitching about me playing Aatrox and not my jungling ability I tend to assume it's about my off-meta pick lol

But yes, that is also an annoying problem as well xP

Everything is your fault anyway, you cant ever do well enough when some brat trash is on the warpath for someone to blame for their failures.
/ignore @champion and proceed to "steal" all their kills and carry.

I know how you feel, I hardly ever play champions considered "meta"

Right now I'm LOVING Yorick, having a massive amount of fun on him, but half the time if I even show him in pick intent my team instantly bans him because they don't want me playing a "trash" champion even though I carry with Yorick often.

And if we lose the game it was my fault for going yorick and not a "real" top laner such as Darius, Garen, or GP.

Sometimes my jungle flat out refuses to ever gank my lane because I'm trolling simply by playing Yorick, especially if I lose lane due to either being camped, being against a bad match-up, or simply playing badly.


Honestly though, it all simply comes down to; people just need something to troll. It usually doesn't matter what it is, they could try to troll your items even if your build is fine (I've been told I'm a retarded autistic %%%got for building Rod of Ages on Brand before.)
That's really all it comes down to, people looking for ammo to try to troll. That's it.

That is just people being utter retards, an example of a real poor top laner is Morde. I tried to play him as a juggernaut he was just too damn slow and lacked CC, Yorick on the other hand can chase you with his E Lockdown with W and Shove ya with his Q, and don't get me started on him being able to kill under someone's tower if he can land his W right.

People will call Yorick a troll pick because he doesn't have all of his power available of the bat and needs his ghouls to a credible threat, and that is the junglers fault for not coordinating and just wanting kills for themselves. I was losing my lane against an aggressive darius when my Zac jumped him, we won the game thanks to him and me utterly mercing the enemy team.

This is why I have trouble playing {{champion:427}} I main him now but people really like to blame me because he isent the kind of jungle to show up and instagib your lane opponent like some one *cough* {{champion:107}} *cough*. I can go 1/1/32 and get no recognition or so much as a thank you and the moment a lane loses it's "man I wish we had a decent jungler", "this idiot picked ivern" etc.

Bullshit.

I just played {{champion:72}}  and no one said anything negative, even though my performance was weak.
I play {{champion:44}} who is severely overnerfed and no one said anything negative (Other than I'm gay but I'm okay with that as Taric).
I played jungle/support {{champion:111}}  and no one said anything negative.

What YOU op are arguing, is that you want to TROLL PICK and have no one call you on it, that's not going to happen because trolling is a bad thing. It's not complicated.

You want to pick your little troll AD Crittle sticks, go for it , but keep that out of ranked or you will get justifiably reported for your trolling.

Skarner is so-so. he not that strong right now but his Ult can easily turn a teamfight into a 4v5 or peel for the team.

Got no hate for naut or taric but Naut jungle is not cool. he is best as a top laner or support.

> [{quoted}](name=DragonShea,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=a1fcQBxg,comment-id=001a0000,timestamp=2017-01-23T01:10:17.273+0000)
>
> Naut jungle is not cool. 

He does fine.

You can dislike it if you want, but it works.

lmao!

So you basically agree with me but you're too self-absorbed to bother reading what I said to realize it!

I know you won't read this either, you know if you do you'll realize just how stupid you've been, but I couldn't help but notice how hilariously ignorant you are.  You're literally the definition of the problem with LoL and what my OP is talking about, you're too perfect lol

Here's an upvote, I want people to see this! LOL

Wow those are some wild assumptions there, glad to see throwing around blind accusations as "reasonable arguments" is still a thing.......

And no, that is not what I'm talking about, "off-role" =/= "off-meta."

No that is not what I want to do and I never said I wanted to, I actually have specifically mentioned multiple times both in the OP and across several comments that I see what you're claiming I'm saying and what I'm actually talking about as two entirely different things.  

Also you don't seem to understand what the No True Scotsman Fallacy actually is, that or you still have no fucking clue what I'm talking about, which I can't see as possible unless you just didn't read anything I typed anywhere on this thread.....

Since you're having so much difficulty, I'll throw you a final bone;  You're inserting "crittle sticks" into the position of Aatrox jungle.  AD fiddle is an "off-role" pick, meaning you're putting him into a position he doesn't perform well in as well as building him counter intuitively to how his kit scales.  Where as jungle Aatrox is a well known viable position but considered "off-meta" and I build him as an attack speed brawler as he's intended to be built, both in effectiveness as well as kit design.

You're trying to insert a concept entirely different then what I'm talking about and then attempting to base your argument on that false premise.  Do YOU understand yet?  This isn't difficult, just actually take a second to bother reading what I'm saying for once.

> [{quoted}](name=Vicarious117,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=a1fcQBxg,comment-id=001a000100000000,timestamp=2017-01-23T06:34:18.551+0000)
>
> No that is not what I want to do


Then you have no argument and nothing you type is worth reading.

Either you're against troll picking or you're in favor. If you're against, then you have nothing to present. You're either a terrible player that gets told that a lot, or you're whining about a non-existent problem.

Omfg you literally just did exactly what I accused you of doing.....  you're embracing your own ignorance cause you're afraid of being wrong?  Seriously?

Then you're simply a waste of space, and anything you post is pointless.

Next?

> [{quoted}](name=Vicarious117,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=a1fcQBxg,comment-id=001a00010000000000000000,timestamp=2017-01-23T06:41:31.549+0000)

That is all.

> [{quoted}](name=Dominick Destine,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=a1fcQBxg,comment-id=001a000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-01-23T06:42:25.722+0000)
>
> you have been destroyed.

Ironic, to say the least.

Welp, I hope you all reading this have a good time, this fool made quite the show of his own ignorance and still doesn't realize it, again because that ignorance is willful.  I wouldn't be surprised if he leaves another comment after this one similar to his last, so stick around, see what else this moron spews out, should be good shit lol

I read the header and thought to myself, "Fuck I hate people with this mentality, this post is just gonna annoy me." But you aren't one of those assholes, I like you.

Edit: I main Akali btw. (Been playing a lot of Fiora tho because she's a lot more reliable than akali rn.)

Glad you don't hate me lol

And yeah I'm in the same boat, I love playing Aatrox and he can be just as effective like Akali can be, but just like how you play more Fiora cause she's easier I tend to play more Rengar and Vi cause they fit into the team better or are safer against the enemies team comp :P

I will never stop playing Akali as i'm sure you will never stop playing Aatrox whether the meta supports them or not. But it is nice to have a reliable goto champ in case the matchup is unfavorable or something. It's pretty refreshing when i play fiora knowing that she can win any matchup if i play well enough unlike Akali where most meta champs are stronger than her atm.

I remember a game where I was playing Vayne top, I absorbed most of their jungles pressure because well... I was a Vayne on the top lane, anyone with  half a brain would camp me, went even with a few kills, shined in the mid game (that was before the crit Vayne build), took top and mid all the way to their base, took the two nexus turrets, couldn't finish the game but I opened  it enough that we could end it when I respawned, but what my team does? They start a 5 v 4, obviously they lose said fight without killing anyone, the enemy team does baron, pushes mid and because I wasn't capable of killing all 5 of them by myself, it was my fault and mine alone that we lost that game, it was just a normal game so I didn't mind the rage, but the level of denial on some people still baffles me to this day.

The Jungler is the most important role in the game right now, they basically decide the game. Whoever is more active around the map (but mostly bot lane) will setup the game in their favor. It doesn't matter what Jungler you are, if you were getting kills/assists around the map more than the other Jungler, you were performing your job. People are meta sheep and don't understand that the meta picks are strong because they are strong at high elo's where players can utilize their strengths properly. At lower elos it isn't as big because most of the time the players don't know how to use those champions to their fullest. Some are stronger in lower elos than at higher elos, like Darius, but overall you can play whatever you are comfortable with as long as you don't under-perform consistently (yasuo "mains" at low elo...). Another exception to the "meta" is one-tricks or mains who play 1 (OTP) or 1-2 (mains) champions in every role. They know the champion so well they are usually able to compete with the stronger champions, although I do think this has a limit.

I hate those people too. I was playing Nasus ADC a few months ago for fun in normals, and despite me killing the enemy Jinx twice my Tahm Kench support flamed the entire game and started trolling. We probably could have won that game too, but Tahm's trolling meant that we had no chance, even though I actually didn't do too bad. It's happened when i played other things like Brand jungle, Maokai support and crap like that.

The thing that pisses me off the most is when they say "I told you it doesn't work". dude it's 1 game, maybe the matchup was bad, the build was wrong, etc. There isn't a single meta champion that wins every matchup so the fact that people like that think Off Meta picks have to dominate every time is just stupid. Strangely enough the high elo players i meet in normals seem to give off meta stuff a chance while low elo players are the ones flaming me hardcore.
Their reasoning must be something like, "If he's that good with Aatrox, surely he could carry our sorry asses with a better champion!" And they go on to ignore the fact that this is a team game.
